message:
Welcome to Sense. This is where you'll see personalized **Sleep Insights** related to your sleeping patterns, habits and bedroom.

From time to time, you'll also be shown **Questions**. Answering these questions will help Sense learn more about you, to provide more accurate and detailed insights over time.
title: Nice To Meet You

message: The National Sleep Foundation recently published a recommendation of 7 to 9 hours of sleep for people your age. While a few people do need a lot less or more, aim to sleep **no less than 6** and **no more than 11** hours a night.
title: How Much Sleep Do We Need?

message:
Having **healthy sleep habits** is crucial to a good night's sleep. Some quick tips:

- Try to stick to the same sleep and wake up time.
- Avoid naps, caffeine drinks and heavy meals close to bedtime.
- Exercise frequently.
- Wind down about an hour before sleep.
title: Sleep Tips
